name: Save Swap
description:
[Made in 2h30m as an entry to Trijam #90]

Use your ability to swap between two different lives to traverse the levels.

[A][D] or [<-][->] to move

[W], [ î ] or [Spacebar] to jump

[Q] or [Shift] to swap

------------

If the game jitters try the downloadable version.
